treatment.description: Subshrubs (flowering twigs dying back each year), (5–)15–60 cm (aromatic). Stems erect, sericeous-canescent. Leaves mostly cauline; blades (linear or linear-oblanceolate, 10–40 mm) entire or pinnately or subpalmately lobed, faces ± sericeous. Heads usually 3–12 in compact, corymbiform cymes (1–3 cm across), sometimes 1–2. Involucres 2.5–4(–6) mm. Phyllaries 10–12, canescent. (Disc corollas ochroleucous, lobes villous.) Cypselae 1.8–1.9 mm (apices with irregular, thickened rims, faces glabrous or slightly gland-dotted). 2n = 18.
